Part 1. Signs of some activity reported amongst small Afghan Garrison in Kuiia Valley and Asinar. Tribal move-men ts in this region so far insignificant.Quetta reports that small force with four guns believed to have moved from Kandahar in direction of FortBaldak. Moral of Afghan troops opposed to us in action 11th instant is now said to be bad. No information of Lashkars collecting in Afghanistan. Attitude of our independent tribes continues good. Internal situation quiet.Part 2. The situation is unchanged on the Baluchistan, Waziristan, and Kohat,borders. On 13th May Dakka was occupied, by our troops.
